info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Brunswick, south central Columbus and central Horry Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 319 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hickory Grove, or 8 miles northeast of Conway, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loris, Bethel, Hickory Grove, Adrian, Nakina, Mollie, Bughill, Hand, Nixonville, Williams, Longs, Hammond, Pireway, Dulah, Goretown, Allsbrook and Loris Community Hospital. This includes SC Highway 22 between mile markers 8 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
